onboarding.selectLanguageSubtitle: You can change it later in Profile

welcome.title: Welcome to Juan Tracker
welcome.subtitle: Your ultimate nutrition & workout companion
welcome.description: Everything you need to reach your fitness goals in one single app.

nutrition.title: Smart Nutrition
nutrition.subtitle: Simplified food diary
nutrition.description: Log your meals easily, automatically calculate macros and track your progress.

training.title: Effective Training
training.subtitle: Routines and strength tracking
training.description: Create custom routines, track your sets and analyze your progress.

coach.title: Adaptive Coach
coach.subtitle: Data-driven automatic adjustments
coach.description: Our system adjusts your goals weekly based on your actual progress.

profile.title: Everything in Profile
profile.subtitle: Help and hidden gestures
profile.description: In the Profile tab you'll find tips, shortcuts and gestures like double-tap, long press and more. Check it out anytime!

quickActions.mealQuestion: Which meal do you want to add to?

settings.title: Profile
settings.completeProfile: Complete your profile to calculate your TDEE
settings.cleanDuplicatesMessage: {{count}} duplicate foods will be merged. The most used food will be kept and references will be updated.
settings.tipsSubtitle: Get the most out of the app
settings.tipSearchDesc: Type just the first letters. The app searches by keywords and synonyms.
settings.tipFrequentDesc: Quick access chips show what you use the most. One tap to add!
settings.tipRepeatDesc: Use "Repeat yesterday" to copy all meals from the previous day.
settings.tipTemplatesDesc: Save meals as templates from the menu (â‹®) of each section.
settings.tipBarcodeDesc: Scan products to automatically add them to your diary.
settings.tipCoachDesc: The weekly check-in adjusts your goals based on your real progress.
settings.tipGrayValues: Gray values are suggestions. Edit them or accept them directly.

checkin.title: Weekly check-in time!
checkin.daysSince: It's been {{count}} days since your last check-in.
checkin.suggestion: Review your progress and adjust your caloric goals if needed.
